t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: Last year Amazon was the world’s most valuable brand, now it’s third on the list. Apple and Google’s exceptionally strong year-on-year growth figures enabled them to leapfrog the retail, media and cloud services giant.
